languages.text: {n}Камень смотрит на вас неподвижным синим глазом. Из отражения в нем вдруг выглядывает морщинистое лицо скомороха: кажется, что на грани сознания слышен его издевательский голос. Тело помнит боль, электричество в воздухе... Что-то плохое.{/n}

{n}As you look at it, the crystal stares back at you with its still blue eye. The fool's wrinkled face suddenly emerges from the reflection, and his gloating voice seems to hang at the edge of your awareness. This body remembers pain and electrified air... Something bad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Камень смотрит на вас неподвижным синим глазом. Из отражения в нем вдруг выглядывает морщинистое лицо скомороха: кажется, что на грани сознания слышен его издевательский голос. Тело помнит боль, электричество в воздухе... Что-то плохое.{/n}

{n}As you look at it, the crystal stares back at you with its still blue eye. The fool's wrinkled face suddenly emerges from the reflection, and his gloating voice seems to hang at the edge of your awareness. This body remembers pain and electrified air... Something bad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你凝视着项链时，湛蓝色的水晶也同样宁静地凝视着你。随后，小丑满是皱纹的面孔突然出现在倒影中，他幸灾乐祸的声音似乎浮现在你的意识的边缘。这具身体依然铭记着剧痛与空气电离的味道……恐怕不是什么好事。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look at it, the crystal stares back at you with its still blue eye. The fool's wrinkled face suddenly emerges from the reflection, and his gloating voice seems to hang at the edge of your awareness. This body remembers pain and electrified air... Something bad.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你凝视着项链时，湛蓝色的水晶也同样宁静地凝视着你。随后，小丑满是皱纹的面孔突然出现在倒影中，他幸灾乐祸的声音似乎浮现在你的意识的边缘。这具身体依然铭记着剧痛与空气电离的味道……恐怕不是什么好事。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando lo miras, el cristal te devuelve la mirada con su azul ojo inerte. El rostro arrugado del bufón aparece repentinamente en tu reflejo, y su voz jactanciosa te atormenta desde los confines de tu mente consciente. Este cuerpo recuerda el dolor y el aire electrificado... algo terrible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look at it, the crystal stares back at you with its still blue eye. The fool's wrinkled face suddenly emerges from the reflection, and his gloating voice seems to hang at the edge of your awareness. This body remembers pain and electrified air... Something bad.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando lo miras, el cristal te devuelve la mirada con su azul ojo inerte. El rostro arrugado del bufón aparece repentinamente en tu reflejo, y su voz jactanciosa te atormenta desde los confines de tu mente consciente. Este cuerpo recuerda el dolor y el aire electrificado... algo terrible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ona bakarken kristal, durgun mavi gözüyle seni inceliyor. Soytarının buruşuk yüzü, aniden yansımadan beliriyor. Alaycı sesi ise farkındalığının kıyısında asılı kalmış gibi görünüyor. Bu beden, acıyı ve elektriklenmiş havayı... Kötü bir şeyi hatırlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look at it, the crystal stares back at you with its still blue eye. The fool's wrinkled face suddenly emerges from the reflection, and his gloating voice seems to hang at the edge of your awareness. This body remembers pain and electrified air... Something bad.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ona bakarken kristal, durgun mavi gözüyle seni inceliyor. Soytarının buruşuk yüzü, aniden yansımadan beliriyor. Alaycı sesi ise farkındalığının kıyısında asılı kalmış gibi görünüyor. Bu beden, acıyı ve elektriklenmiş havayı... Kötü bir şeyi hatırlıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}それを見ると、クリスタルはその静かな青い目であなたを見返す。道化のしわくちゃの顔が突然反射して現れ、彼の勝ち誇ったような声が意識の隅に引っかかっている。この体は痛みやしびれるような空気を覚えている…何かがまずい。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look at it, the crystal stares back at you with its still blue eye. The fool's wrinkled face suddenly emerges from the reflection, and his gloating voice seems to hang at the edge of your awareness. This body remembers pain and electrified air... Something bad.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}それを見ると、クリスタルはその静かな青い目であなたを見返す。道化のしわくちゃの顔が突然反射して現れ、彼の勝ち誇ったような声が意識の隅に引っかかっている。この体は痛みやしびれるような空気を覚えている…何かがまずい。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alors que vous plongez votre regard dans le cristal, le minéral vous fixe en retour de son œil bleu. Le visage ridé du fou émerge soudain du reflet, et sa voix jubilatoire semble comme résonner faiblement à la lisière de votre conscience. Ce corps se souvient de la souffrance et de l'air électrifié... De quelque chose de terrible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look at it, the crystal stares back at you with its still blue eye. The fool's wrinkled face suddenly emerges from the reflection, and his gloating voice seems to hang at the edge of your awareness. This body remembers pain and electrified air... Something bad.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors que vous plongez votre regard dans le cristal, le minéral vous fixe en retour de son œil bleu. Le visage ridé du fou émerge soudain du reflet, et sa voix jubilatoire semble comme résonner faiblement à la lisière de votre conscience. Ce corps se souvient de la souffrance et de l'air électrifié... De quelque chose de terrible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du ihn betrachtet, erwidert der Kristall deinen Blick mit seinem reglosen blauen Auge. Plötzlich taucht aus dem Spiegelbild das faltige Gesicht des Narren auf, dessen höhnische Stimme vom Rand deines Bewusstseins widerzuhallen scheint. Dieser Körper erinnert sich an Schmerz und an elektrisierte Luft ... Etwas Schlimmes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look at it, the crystal stares back at you with its still blue eye. The fool's wrinkled face suddenly emerges from the reflection, and his gloating voice seems to hang at the edge of your awareness. This body remembers pain and electrified air... Something bad.{/n}
